display: Analyse. Add an sbt-plugin, outdated. Check if you can see why scala-steward doesn't run on push. Fix it.
Check the readme. Check the scala-steward and renovate config files. Explain these.
Add a comparison and evaluation of the two different configuration approaches.
has everything been pushed to the repo?
we also have internal libs, like ista-common. They are in our inhouse-artifact-manager. How do I configure checks for these?
to find the precise URLs and project coordinates, please check ~/git/rdm/sbt/base-settings
So, I need to add the CI/CD Varialbe? How does Scala Steward access the registry? Is the registry token really needed?
Check my local branch in the UI project. It looks like the field lastConsumptionDateFrom and lastConsumptionDateTo are not used anymore. Is that correct?
In core-extapi, create a branch with the same name as this one. Remove those fields there, run sbt publishLocal
what is the base url for our registry?
print the repository config of the base-settings plugin
